name: Add new rows to Google Sheets for new tasks in Workstack
description: Every time a new task is created in Workstack, Make will automatically add that task's info to a new row in your Google Sheets. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1mhwKXOEFF1PQh-X1M1j-8M6ENXpHFKMrmXsYzTQL2sQ/edit?usp=sharing).
